P

Paddock - Class in Monitors
The Paddock class is a monitor that contains necessary methods to be used in mutual exclusive access by Horses and Spectators.
Paddock() - Constructor for class Monitors.Paddock
 
Parameters - Class in Monitors.AuxiliaryClasses
Class containing the Parameters of the HorseRace.
Parameters() - Constructor for class Monitors.AuxiliaryClasses.Parameters
 
placeABet(int, double, int, double) - Static method in class Monitors.BettingCentre
Spectator waits in line, places a Bet and then wakes the Broker.
proceedToPaddock() - Static method in class Monitors.ControlCentreAndWatchingStand
Horse proceeds to paddock, last Horse awakes Spectators that are waiting for the Horses to enter the Paddock.
proceedToPaddock(int, int) - Static method in class Monitors.Paddock
The Horses enter the paddock and add their information to the Paddock.horsesInPaddock array, then they wait until all the Spectators have reached the Paddock, at the end the last Horse awakes the Spectators.
proceedToStable(int) - Static method in class Monitors.Stable
Horses wait to move to Paddock.
proceedToStartLine() - Static method in class Monitors.Paddock
Called by the Horse to exit the Paddock.
proceedToStartLine(int) - Static method in class Monitors.RaceTrack
The Horses write their information on the array RaceTrack.horses, and then wait for their turn to proceed.
